content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":71371,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっても物知りだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He's very knowledgeable.\""},{"lineNumber":71372,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、ハニーが現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, Hanny has appeared."},{"lineNumber":71373,"originalJapaneseLine":"　割るか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall I break it?\""},{"lineNumber":71374,"originalJapaneseLine":"「割っちゃ、いやーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't break it—nooo!\""},{"lineNumber":71375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなことより君達、今難易度アップしたね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More importantly, you guys, the difficulty just increased!\""},{"lineNumber":71376,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　そうなのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":71377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、随分と難易度が高くなって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, the difficulty has really gone up...\""},{"lineNumber":71378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「難易度が高くなるとモンスターが強くなる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When the difficulty rises, monsters get stronger."},{"lineNumber":71379,"originalJapaneseLine":"　理屈は不明だけど、これが世の仕組みなんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't know the reason, but that's how the world works.\""},{"lineNumber":71380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ難易度アップ床は踏んだらやばい、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, just remember that stepping on a difficulty-up tile is bad,"},{"lineNumber":71381,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ってことだけ覚えればいいよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"that's all you really need to know.\""},{"lineNumber":71382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「踏んだらやばい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stepping on it is bad...\""},{"lineNumber":71383,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……神様のブロマイドと同じくらいですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Is it as bad as the god's bromide?\""},{"lineNumber":71384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこまではやばくないよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's not that bad.\""},{"lineNumber":71385,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかく、頑張ってねー、はにほー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway, do your best! Haniho~\""},{"lineNumber":71386,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんのこっちゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What on earth is that about?\""},{"lineNumber":71387,"originalJapaneseLine":"「勉強になりましたね、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That was educational, wasn't it, Lord Rance?\""},{"lineNumber":71388,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":71389,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス砦の朝――","translatedEnglishLine":"Morning at Rance's Fort—"},{"lineNumber":71390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふあああ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fuaaah...\""},{"lineNumber":71391,"originalJapaneseLine":"　朝の散歩ってのはいいもんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Morning walks are really nice.\""},{"lineNumber":71392,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right.\""},{"lineNumber":71393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　下の方で戦闘が行われてるな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm? There's a fight going on down below...\""},{"lineNumber":71394,"originalJapaneseLine":"崖の下に目をやれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking down the cliff,"},{"lineNumber":71395,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやら砦を目指して襲ってきた魔物を、","translatedEnglishLine":"it seemed that monsters attacking the fort were"},{"lineNumber":71396,"originalJapaneseLine":"城の常備兵達が撃退しているらしかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"being repelled by the fort's standing soldiers."},{"lineNumber":71397,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、大丈夫でしょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-are they going to be okay?\""},{"lineNumber":71398,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、大丈夫ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, it'll be fine.\""},{"lineNumber":71399,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、ウルザちゃん、おはよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Ulza, good morning."},{"lineNumber":71400,"originalJapaneseLine":"　心配は無用なのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"No need to worry?\""},{"lineNumber":71401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おはようございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good morning.\""},{"lineNumber":71402,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この砦は天然の要塞、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This fort is a natural fortress,"},{"lineNumber":71403,"originalJapaneseLine":"　道幅が狭いので、魔物が攻めてきても、","translatedEnglishLine":"the road is narrow, so even if monsters attack,"},{"lineNumber":71404,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ごく少数ですので――」","translatedEnglishLine":"only a very small number can come through—\""},{"lineNumber":71405,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――少ない兵でもちゃーんと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—meaning even a small number of soldiers"},{"lineNumber":71406,"originalJapaneseLine":"　撃退できるってことか」","translatedEnglishLine":"can properly repel them.\""},{"lineNumber":71407,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういや試したい技もあったのだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now that you mention it, there's a technique I wanted to try,"},{"lineNumber":71408,"originalJapaneseLine":"　暇潰し……」","translatedEnglishLine":"just killing time...\""},{"lineNumber":71409,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もとい経験値稼ぎを兼ねて","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Or rather, to earn some experience points,"},{"lineNumber":71410,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょいと俺もしばいてくるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll go and beat some up myself.\""},{"lineNumber":71411,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":71412,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、ランス兄様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Brother Rance."},{"lineNumber":71413,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうかしましたか、不思議そうな顔してますが」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is something the matter? You look curious.\""},{"lineNumber":71414,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、この治水ってコマンドはなにかと思ってな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I was wondering what this 'Flood Control' command was.\""},{"lineNumber":71415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「治水工事を皆さんにお願いするんです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You ask everyone to do flood control construction.\""},{"lineNumber":71416,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なにそれ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What’s that?\""},{"lineNumber":71417,"originalJapaneseLine":"「川に工事をして、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's about doing work on rivers,"},{"lineNumber":71418,"originalJapaneseLine":"　台風が来ても洪水にならないようにしたり、","translatedEnglishLine":"so that even if a typhoon comes, there won’t be floods,"},{"lineNumber":71419,"originalJapaneseLine":"　田まで水を引いたりすることですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"and also to channel water to rice fields.\""},{"lineNumber":71420,"originalJapaneseLine":"「治水工事はとっても大事なんですよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Flood control works are very important, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":71421,"originalJapaneseLine":"「左様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed!\""},{"lineNumber":71322,"originalJapaneseLine":"「治水工事を行うことにより、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"By doing flood control construction,"},{"lineNumber":71423,"originalJapaneseLine":"　秋に収穫する米の量が増加！」","translatedEnglishLine":"the amount of rice harvested in autumn increases!\""},{"lineNumber":71424,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これにより兵糧は増え、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because of this, food supplies increase,"},{"lineNumber":71425,"originalJapaneseLine":"　長期的な戦争にも耐えることが可能！","translatedEnglishLine":"making it possible to endure long-term wars!"},{"lineNumber":71426,"originalJapaneseLine":"　つまり！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In other words!\""},{"lineNumber":71427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「治水工事はとっても大事ですぞー！×３」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Flood control construction is very important! ×3\""},{"lineNumber":71428,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やりますか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shall we do it?\""},{"lineNumber":71429,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":71430,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃ……頼む……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then... I'll leave it to you...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなことより君達、今難易度アップしたね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, you guys, the difficulty just increased!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、随分と難易度が高くなって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, the difficulty has really gone up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「難易度が高くなるとモンスターが強くなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When the difficulty rises, monsters get stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 理屈は不明だけど、これが世の仕組みなんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know the reason, but that's how the world works."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ難易度アップ床は踏んだらやばい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, just remember that stepping on a difficulty-up tile is bad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってことだけ覚えればいいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's all you really need to know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……神様のブロマイドと同じくらいですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Is it as bad as the god's bromide?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく、頑張ってねー、はにほー」
「勉強になりましたね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That was educational, wasn't it, Lord Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝の散歩ってのはいいもんだ」
「ん？　下の方で戦闘が行われてるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? There's a fight going on down below..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら砦を目指して襲ってきた魔物を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seemed that monsters attacking the fort were

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城の常備兵達が撃退しているらしかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: being repelled by the fort's standing soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、ウルザちゃん、おはよう。
道幅が狭いので、魔物が攻めてきても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the road is narrow, so even if monsters attack,
only a very small number can come through—"
"—meaning even a small number of soldiers

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 撃退できるってことか」
「そういや試したい技もあったのだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now that you mention it, there's a technique I wanted to try,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もとい経験値稼ぎを兼ねて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or rather, to earn some experience points,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょいと俺もしばいてくるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll go and beat some up myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうかしましたか、不思議そうな顔してますが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is something the matter? You look curious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、この治水ってコマンドはなにかと思ってな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I was wondering what this 'Flood Control' command was."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「治水工事を皆さんにお願いするんです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You ask everyone to do flood control construction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 台風が来ても洪水にならないようにしたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so that even if a typhoon comes, there won’t be floods,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 田まで水を引いたりすることですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and also to channel water to rice fields."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「治水工事はとっても大事なんですよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Flood control works are very important, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「治水工事を行うことにより、
秋に収穫する米の量が増加！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the amount of rice harvested in autumn increases!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長期的な戦争にも耐えることが可能！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making it possible to endure long-term wars!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「治水工事はとっても大事ですぞー！×３」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... I'll leave it to you..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなことより君達、今難易度アップしたね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More importantly, you guys, the difficulty just increased!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、随分と難易度が高くなって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, the difficulty has really gone up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「難易度が高くなるとモンスターが強くなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When the difficulty rises, monsters get stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 理屈は不明だけど、これが世の仕組みなんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know the reason, but that's how the world works."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ難易度アップ床は踏んだらやばい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, just remember that stepping on a difficulty-up tile is bad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ってことだけ覚えればいいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's all you really need to know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……神様のブロマイドと同じくらいですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Is it as bad as the god's bromide?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく、頑張ってねー、はにほー」
「勉強になりましたね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That was educational, wasn't it, Lord Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝の散歩ってのはいいもんだ」
「ん？　下の方で戦闘が行われてるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? There's a fight going on down below..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら砦を目指して襲ってきた魔物を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seemed that monsters attacking the fort were

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城の常備兵達が撃退しているらしかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: being repelled by the fort's standing soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、ウルザちゃん、おはよう。
道幅が狭いので、魔物が攻めてきても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the road is narrow, so even if monsters attack,
only a very small number can come through—"
"—meaning even a small number of soldiers

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 撃退できるってことか」
「そういや試したい技もあったのだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now that you mention it, there's a technique I wanted to try,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もとい経験値稼ぎを兼ねて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or rather, to earn some experience points,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょいと俺もしばいてくるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll go and beat some up myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうかしましたか、不思議そうな顔してますが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is something the matter? You look curious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、この治水ってコマンドはなにかと思ってな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I was wondering what this 'Flood Control' command was."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「治水工事を皆さんにお願いするんです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You ask everyone to do flood control construction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 台風が来ても洪水にならないようにしたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so that even if a typhoon comes, there won’t be floods,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 田まで水を引いたりすることですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and also to channel water to rice fields."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「治水工事はとっても大事なんですよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Flood control works are very important, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「治水工事を行うことにより、
秋に収穫する米の量が増加！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the amount of rice harvested in autumn increases!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長期的な戦争にも耐えることが可能！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making it possible to endure long-term wars!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「治水工事はとっても大事ですぞー！×３」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... I'll leave it to you..."
